common.name: Mafia
common.description: Works with other Mafia members to eliminate all non-mafia players

common.name: Angel
common.description: Can protect one person from being killed each night (even themselves)

common.name: Detective
common.description: Can investigate one person each night to detmine if they are a Mafia

common.name: Suicide Bomber
common.description: Can choose to take someone down with them at any point during a town meeting

uncommon.name: Jester
uncommon.description: Wins by getting themselves voted out

uncommon.name: Reviver
uncommon.description: Can revive a dead person once they have been dead for at least one round

uncommon.name: Vigilante
uncommon.description: Can choose to eliminate someone during night time but if they choose a non-mafia role they are eliminated along with the player they chose

uncommon.name: Lover
uncommon.description: Will die if the other lover dies

uncommon.name: Tanker
uncommon.description: Requires 2 nights for mafias to be able to kill them

uncommon.name: Blackmailer
uncommon.description: Silences a player, preventing them from speaking during discussions. Works together with the mafias

uncommon.name: Mayor
uncommon.description: Can reveal their role in-game during the day. Once revealed, their vote counts as 3

uncommon.name: Bodyguard
uncommon.description: Can choose one player to protect each night. If the Mafia tries to kill that player, the Bodyguard dies instead

uncommon.name: Mafia Godfather
uncommon.description: The leader of the Mafia. Appears innocent when investigated by the Detective

uncommon.name: Roleblocker
uncommon.description: Prevents a target player from using their night ability

uncommon.name: Executioner
uncommon.description: Assigned a random town player. Wins if that player gets voted out

uncommon.name: Arsonist
uncommon.description: Douses one person per night (point at a person to douse them). Can ignite all doused players at once to eliminate them (raise your hand to ignite). Cannot douse and ignite in the same night

uncommon.name: Amnesiac
uncommon.description: Can choose to permanently adopt the role of a dead player

uncommon.name: Framer
uncommon.description: Frames a player each night to appear guilty to Cops. Wins with the mafias
